scripts.build:less: for file in ./src/less/*.less; do less-fixed $file ./dist/assets/${file:11:(${#file}-15)}css & done
scripts.watch:js: for file in ./src/js/*.js; do watchify $file -o ${file/#.\/src\/js/.\/dist\/assets} -v & done
scripts.gh-publish: git checkout gh-pages; git merge master; npm run build:docs; git add dist/code/**; git add -A; git commit -m 'only for gh-pages'; git subtree push --prefix=dist origin gh-pages; git checkout master;
